PERFORMANCE.DISABLE_IO_THROTTLING: Disabling IO throttling can severely impact the site performance. Unchecking 'Enable IO throttling' should only be done with the guidance of Zerto support.
PERFORMANCE.WARN_SETTING_TITLE: Use the following only when directed by Zerto support.

POLICIES.DISABLE_REPLICATE_SELF: You will no longer be able to create VPGs replicating to self (existing VPGs will not be affected).
POLICIES.ALLOW_MAINTENANCE_MODE: Allow Zerto to always enter hosts to maintenance mode during remediation

CONFIGURE_PROVIDER_VDCS.TITLE: Configure Provider vDCs
CONFIGURE_PROVIDER_VDCS.TEXT: When replicating to a Provider vDC and none of the specified journal datastores are configured under the Provider vDC, or if there are no specified journal datastores, the journal entries can be saved to any datastore configured under the Provider vDC.
CONFIGURE_PROVIDER_VDCS.USE_FOR_REPLICATION: Unlisted datastores are not used by Zerto Virtual Replication.
CONFIGURE_PROVIDER_VDCS.USE_FOR_NOT_REPLICATION: Unlisted datastores are used only for recovery volumes.

ABOUT_SITE.COPYRIGHT: Copyright Â© 2016, Zerto Ltd. All rights reserved. This product is protected by U.S. and international copyright and intellectual property laws. Patents pending.
ABOUT_SITE.WARNING_TEXT: Unchecking "Enable Support notification and analytics" will stop Zerto sending you notifications when new Zerto Virtual Replication updates are available or when new hosts are supported.
ABOUT_SITE.SEND_DATA_TO_CLOUD: Enable Online Services and Zerto Mobile
ABOUT_SITE.CLOUD_WARNING_TEXT: Unchecking "Enable Online Services and Zerto Mobile Application" will stop Zerto Virtual Replication from sending information to Online Services and to the Zerto Mobile Application, rendering these services inoperable for your entire installation.
ABOUT_SITE.INFORMATION: The below services provide information to Zerto to improve your support interactions and enhance your overall experience with Zerto and our products.  With this capability enabled, the support team at Zerto will be able to offer higher quality assistance while identifying opportunities for optimization in your environment. This service requires a valid support contract for the Zerto solution and for support data to be transmitted to Zerto.  If you uncheck these boxes Zerto support services effectiveness, like release notifications, online services and Zerto Mobile, will be impacted.  For more information, please visit our Privacy Statement at
